item.description:
Attorney Turned Yogi - Meet Rajshree Patel

Join in the Boston Meditates campaign

Buy Tickets NOW for the Kick-off event

Having attained success as a lawyer at a very young age, Rajshree Patel felt the need to explore inner fulfillment and devoted herself to this journey. Twenty years later, this charismatic teacher is coming to Boston to impart through her wit and wisdom, the profound knowledge of the ancient sages and how to achieve it through simple meditation techniques.

Rajshree has lectured and taught courses to over 25,000 people in 35 countries, including places such as World Bank, The United Nations, The Pentagon, Harvard University, Shell Oil, Morgan Stanley. She has organized and taught large programs in prisons, community schools with at-risk youth, and on college campuses.

The weekend culminates with a special meditation workshop (Aug 4-6) with Rajshree Patel from Aug 4 - 6. Register yourself for the workshop at www.BostonMeditates.org

If you are signing up for the full workshop on www.BostonMeditates.org, this talk is included with the workshop.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup group will gather right outside 3 Church St at 6:45PM
item.name: Join 'Boston Meditates'
